title: Cold Heat # 1-6 (Picturebox)
description:
5 issues (the last being a double issue) published by Picturebox around 2006-2009

This is still an on-going series of which later parts has appeared in Mome

Written by Ben Jones (Paper Rad) and drawn by Frank Santoro (Storeyville), 
Cold Heat is the story of Castle, an 18 year old girl who embarks on a life altering adventure through anti-depressants, corporate rock'n'roll, globalization and sex.

Cold Heat is a hypnotically tranced out, maximum volume take 
on the action/adventure genre that stays out all night and doesn't come 
home until the party's over and it's time to crash.
